# xlsx_data_parsing
used to assist my sister


raw data is consist as follows
ID        Date      size  times
01642719	20151216	2800	2
01642719	20151229	2800	2
01642719	20160112	2800	2
00902158	20160523	4200	3
00902158	20160523	2100	3
01775101	20170112	4200	3
01775101	20170112	1050	3
01775101	20170202	5600	4
01775101	20170713	2800	2
01775101	20170727	5600	4
01775101	20170824	2800	2
02283407	20160831	4200	3
02283407	20160831	1050	3
02283407	20160921	5600	4
02283407	20161019	7000	5
02283407	20161121	2800	4
02283407	20161228	5600	4
02283407	20161228	1400	4
02283407	20170123	8400	6
02283407	20170308	8400	6
02283407	20170419	2800	4
02283407	20170419	1400	4
02283407	20170531	2800	4
02283407	20170531	1400	4
02283407	20170627	5600	4
02283407	20170725	5600	4

this xlsx file will be changed as follows
ID      start     end       initial_week    initial_size      cumulative_size     cumulative_weeks
1642719	20151216	20160112	2	2800	8400	6						
902158	20160523	20160523	3	6300	6300	3						
1775101	20170713	20170824	2	2800	11200	8	20170112	20170202	3	5250	10850	7
2283407	20160831	20170725	3	5250	64050	48
